name: In My Backyard
description:
This is a short walking simulator demo level.

You are invited to take a walk though a garden inhabited by gigantic insects. 

The main idea was to give a feeling of being small, so the level design in general, camera settings, lighting and sounds are centered around this concept.

This is more of an atmospheric walking experience, rather than a game, but you can ride a giant metal dragonfly above the location to get a glimpse of how the level is made :)

___________________________________________________________________________________

Assets used to build this demo

  • Insect models bought in Unity Asset Store
  • Environment packs - Epic Games
    • InfintyBlade
    • Paragon
    • SoulCave
    • SoulCity 
    • KiteDemo
  • Music and Sound
    • Sounds by Freesound.org https://freesound.org
    • Floating Cities by Kevin MacLeod
      • Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3765-floating-cities

    • Lost Time by Kevin MacLeod

      • License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
